Author: vodkabipolar
Text: This is exactly what I do with my boyfriend. Boys just seem like they can eat whatever the fuck they want sometimes. O just can't stop myself from eating. It makes me mad bc when I tell him he says "No!! You're beautiful even with a tummy/thighs/etc/" and it makes me so angry. You're lying!

Author: sickcupcake
Text: This happens on many weekends I spend with my boyfriend. We love to get high, watch good shows, play good games, and eat good snacks. UNFORTUNATELY, I have an awful relationship with food and heavily restrict all week, so when we get the munchies and I’m presented with Taco Bell, Doritos, and Oreos, I cannot stop myself and I binge the whole weekend. It happened this weekend and now I’m bloated and sore. I’ve started a 48-hour minimum fast to hopefully undo the damage I’ve caused.
